channel.title: Online banking on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Online banking on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Ally Bank Logo
Ally Bank is a unit of Ally Financial, headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, which became a bank holding company in December 2008. The bank is headquartered in Midvale, Utah. It operated two offices in the United States, one in Utah and one in Pennsylvania, and had 616 employees as of June 2009. A corporate center is located in Charlotte, North Carolina. The bank has no branches and customers handle their banking affairs entirely online.
You can download theAlly Banklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Ally Bank
item.description: Ally Bank is a unit of Ally Financial, headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, which became a bank holding company in December 2008. The bank is headquartered in Midvale, Utah. It operated two offices in the United States, one in Utah and one in Pennsylvania, and had 616 employees as of June 2009. A corporate center is located in Charlotte, North Carolina. The bank has no branches and customers handle their banking affairs entirely online.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Sony Financial Holdings Logo
Sony Financial Holdings Inc., founded on 1 April 2004, is a Japanese holding company for Sony’s financial services business and headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. It operates various businesses, including both life and non-life insurances, online banking, credit card settlement, nursing care, and venture capital. On May 19, 2020, Sony Corporation announced that it will turn Sony Financial Holdings, of which Sony already owns 65.06% of shares, to a wholly owned subsidiary through a tender offer.
You can download theSony Financial Holdingslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sony Financial Holdings
item.description: Sony Financial Holdings Inc., founded on 1 April 2004, is a Japanese holding company for Sony’s financial services business and headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. It operates various businesses, including both life and non-life insurances, online banking, credit card settlement, nursing care, and venture capital. On May 19, 2020, Sony Corporation announced that it will turn Sony Financial Holdings, of which Sony already owns 65.06% of shares, to a wholly owned subsidiary through a tender offer.
